entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mont-Tremblant
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
